get.description: Returns an attachment
Returns comment for a work item at the specified revision
Returns specified number of comments for a work item from the specified revision

parameters.name: fromRevision
parameters.description: Revision from which comments are to be fetched

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: The number of comments to return

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Ascending or descending by revision id

get.description: Gets information on a specific field.
Returns information for all fields.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Use ExtensionFields to include extension fields, otherwise exclude them. Unless the feature flag for this parameter is enabled, extension fields are always included.

post.description: Creates a query, or moves a query.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The parent path for the query to create.

get.description: Retrieves a single query by project and either id or path
Retrieves all queries the user has access to in the current project
Returns a fully hydrated work item for the requested revision
Returns the list of fully hydrated work item revisions, paged.
Gets template

parameters.name: workitemtypename
parameters.description: Optional, When specified returns templates for given Work item type.

delete.description: Deletes the template with given id

get.description: Gets the template with specified id
Returns a single update for a work item
Returns a the deltas between work item revisions

post.description: Gets the results of the query.

get.description: Gets the results of the query by id.
Get a batch of work item links

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: A list of types to filter the results to specific work item types. Omit this parameter to get work item links of all work item types.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Specifies the continuationToken to start the batch from. Omit this parameter to get the first batch of links.

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: Date/time to use as a starting point for link changes. Only link changes that occurred after that date/time will be returned. Cannot be used in conjunction with 'watermark' parameter.

get.description: Gets the work item relation types.
Get a batch of work item revisions with the option of including deleted items

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A list of fields to return in work item revisions. Omit this parameter to get all reportable fields.

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: A list of types to filter the results to specific work item types. Omit this parameter to get work item revisions of all work item types.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Specifies the watermark to start the batch from. Omit this parameter to get the first batch of revisions.

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: Date/time to use as a starting point for revisions, all revisions will occur after this date/time. Cannot be used in conjunction with 'watermark' parameter.

parameters.name: includeIdentityRef
parameters.description: Return an identity reference instead of a string value for identity fields.

parameters.name: includeDeleted
parameters.description: Specify if the deleted item should be returned.

parameters.name: includeTagRef
parameters.description: Specify if the tag objects should be returned for System.Tags field.

parameters.name: includeLatestOnly
parameters.description: Return only the latest revisions of work items, skipping all historical revisions

post.description: Get a batch of work item revisions

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object that contains request settings: field filter, type filter, identity format

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Specifies the watermark to start the batch from. Omit this parameter to get the first batch of revisions.

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: Date/time to use as a starting point for revisions, all revisions will occur after this date/time. Cannot be used in conjunction with 'watermark' parameter.

activityDate.description: Date of the last Activity by the user

changedDate.description: Last changed date of the work item

identityId.description: TeamFoundationId of the user this activity belongs to

teamProject.description: Team project the work item belongs to

workItemTypeStateColors.description: State colors for all work item type in a project

fields.description: A list of fields to return in work item revisions. Omit this parameter to get all reportable fields.

includeDeleted.description: Include deleted work item in the result.

includeIdentityRef.description: Return an identity reference instead of a string value for identity fields.

includeLatestOnly.description: Include only the latest version of a work item, skipping over all previous revisions of the work item.

includeTagRef.description: Include tag reference instead of string value for System.Tags field

types.description: A list of types to filter the results to specific work item types. Omit this parameter to get work item revisions of all work item types.
